title: BRIEF-Colliers International Says To Buy Controlling Stake In Synergy Property Development Services
text:
BRIEF-Colliers International Says To Buy Controlling Stake In Synergy Property Development Services

Stock Markets 36 minutes ago (Sep 18, 2019 02:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Colliers International Says To Buy Controlling Stake In Synergy Property Development Services Sept 18 (Reuters) - Colliers International Group Inc : * COLLIERS INTERNATIONAL CREATES TOP TIER PLAYER IN INDIA * COLLIERS INTERNATIONAL GROUP - AGREED TO ACQUIRE CONTROLLING INTEREST IN LEADING PROJECT MANAGEMENT FIRM SYNERGY PROPERTY DEVELOPMENT SERVICES * TERMS OF TRANSACTION WERE NOT DISCLOSED * SENIOR LEADERSHIP OF SYNERGY WILL REMAIN SIGNIFICANT SHAREHOLDERS OF COMBINED BUSINESS UNDER CO
